overview: Every human being knows it: privacy. Where do intimate moments occur, moments in which intimacy is openly expressed. In search of these moments, a gay-porno production firm, the Wa(h)re-Liebe television reporting team from Berlin, flew to Majorca with Lukas Schmid, a  documentary film director.  Intimitaeten is a cinema-direct documentary film in which various ways of approaching and analysing intimacy are explored.
title: Intimitäten
